VIII.iv.4.A.9.a
.
Entitlement to a Higher A&A Allowance Under 38 U.S.C. 1114(r)(2)
A Veteran entitled to the A&A allowance under
38 U.S.C. 1114(r)(1)
is entitled to receive, in lieu of that allowance, a higher A&A allowance under
38 U.S.C 1114(r)(2)
if the Veteran is found to be in need of, and receiving, a higher level of care.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 4, Section A - Special Monthly Compensation (SMC)
